name: CodeParrot AI
headline: Helps Developers build stunning UI Lightning Fast √¢¬ö¬°√Ø¬∏¬è
description: CodeParrot is a developer first design to code tool. It uses AI to convert components from Figma files / screenshots to production-ready code.

founders.name: Royal Jain, Founder
founders.description:
CEO at CodeParrot - Helps Developers build stunning UI Lightning Fast √¢¬ö¬°√Ø¬∏¬è 

Royal is a software developer turned Entrepreneur. Previously, CTO of a startup with $7 million ARR, acquired by an edtech unicorn. He was the founding engineer at voice analytics company Deepaffects (acquired by RingCentral) after completing computer science graduation from IIT Bombay.

founders.name: Vedant Agarwala, Founder
founders.description: Engineering leader. Led backend and mobile teams at unicorn tech company Apna Jobs and scaled systems to handle 100 million daily requests. 2x founder, dropped out of college to start quick commerce platform Instano (acqui-hired by MagicTiger).

## Build on your Existing Projects
Integrate themes, components and libraries from your existing projects.
## Coding Standards
Follows your coding standards to get the code as you like it
## Build in minutes, not days
Review and Refine UI components instead of starting from scratch
## Add to your existing workflow
IDE plugins to ensure zero context switches.
![background](https://codeparrot.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fbg.4471923f.png&w=3840&q=75)
Why CodeParrot?
![logos](https://codeparrot.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Flogos.2fffeaa9.png&w=3840&q=75)
Imagine if Figma and Github Copilot had a baby.CodeParrot is the only UI generation platform which understands your codebase. Build new pages in minutes using your existing components and coding standards.
[View ComparisonView Comparison![comparison icon](https://codeparrot.ai/_next/static/media/icons-comparison.bb50b919.svg)](https://codeparrot.ai/</blogs/why-codeparrot>)

![Preju Kanuparthy](https://codeparrot.ai/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia.licdn.com%2Fdms%2Fimage%2FD5603AQHzcEhk7IyiGQ%2Fprofile-displayphoto-shrink_200_200%2F0%2F1679522191171%3Fe%3D1724284800%26v%3Dbeta%26t%3DBLQdytKU1btnpBKPtgVSXDGTZPa9kXfvuSZ0JEfYb48&w=96&q=75)
#### Preju Kanuparthy
Founder, Genesis Rum
![Quote](https://codeparrot.ai/_next/static/media/quote.918dd155.svg)
‚Äò‚ÄôI had the opportunity to test it, and I found it to be an impressive and innovative tool. It shows great potential in converting Figma files to production-ready code while reusing existing components and adhering to coding standards.‚Äô‚Äô
![Ahmad Jafari](https://codeparrot.ai/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia.licdn.com%2Fdms%2Fimage%2FD5603AQFXyCD6D-hUWg%2Fprofile-displayphoto-shrink_200_200%2F0%2F1670967339886%3Fe%3D1724284800%26v%3Dbeta%26t%3Dw5yDEjqkneKqoZm2Js6LAXg76zIH5yh4aEdn0ubRIUk&w=96&q=75)
#### Ahmad Jafari
Senior Front-end Developer, Avicenna Research
![Quote](https://codeparrot.ai/_next/static/media/quote.918dd155.svg)
‚Äò‚ÄôThis plugin offers fantastic opportunities for JavaScript/TypeScript frontend development. If you have a Figma project or a simple picture of a website, you can create websites in just a few hours or improve your existing code. I decided to create a project using Angular 18 (you can use React, Vue, etc), TypeScript, and SCSS. By asking CodeParrot a few questions, the main files were generated in no time.‚Äô‚Äô
![Igor Aniskevich](https://codeparrot.ai/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia.licdn.com%2Fdms%2Fimage%2FD4D03AQFlzMPjAdAHVw%2Fprofile-displayphoto-shrink_200_200%2F0%2F1677848412669%3Fe%3D1724284800%26v%3Dbeta%26t%3DOAWjPvMVNj3E0EU6YH6qlzL2dnn61L7jBLNhCUQl_BM&w=96&q=75)
#### Igor Aniskevich
Frontend Engineer, BelVG
![Quote](https://codeparrot.ai/_next/static/media/quote.918dd155.svg)
‚Äò‚ÄôIn the past, translating designs into code was always a boring and time-consuming process. But with CodeParrot, everything has changed! I simply uploaded my design, configured the desired code settings, and in a matter of seconds, I had ready-to-use code. Furthermore, CodeParrot can take reference from Figma, a design application, which makes the process even more convenient and faster. CodeParrot is a real must-have for any developer who wants to: Reduce UI development time, Improve code quality, Focus on more creative tasks‚Äô‚Äô
![Maksim Liashch](https://codeparrot.ai/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedia.licdn.com%2Fdms%2Fimage%2FD4D03AQE4vf2QiNxdnA%2Fprofile-displayphoto-shrink_200_200%2F0%2F1718259515119%3Fe%3D1724889600%26v%3Dbeta%26t%3DBhgO-YuWCnRVcGpxCRq0rzKjf7gSXRYOFMiEz4Yi0bg&w=96&q=75)
#### Maksim Liashch
Co-Founder, Buy It Marketplace
![Quote](https://codeparrot.ai/_next/static/media/quote.918dd155.svg)
‚Äò‚ÄôI love it. This is an amazing tool that converts Figma designs into clear code. It allows for easy import and quick processing of Figma files. It fits seamlessly into various workflows by offering customization options and support for frameworks like React, Vue, and Angular. Thank you buddy for suggesting. ‚ù§Ô∏è It.‚Äô‚Äô

![Quote‚ü®55‚ü©]
‚Äò‚ÄôI had the opportunity to test it, and I found it to be an impressive and innovative tool. It shows great potential in converting Figma files to production-ready code while reusing existing components and adhering to coding standards.‚Äô‚Äô

#### Ahmad Jafari
Senior Front-end Developer, Avicenna Research
![Quote‚ü®55‚ü©]
‚Äò‚ÄôThis plugin offers fantastic opportunities for JavaScript/TypeScript frontend development. If you have a Figma project or a simple picture of a website, you can create websites in just a few hours or improve your existing code. I decided to create a project using Angular 18 (you can use React, Vue, etc), TypeScript, and SCSS. By asking CodeParrot a few questions, the main files were generated in no time.‚Äô‚Äô
![Igor Aniskevich‚ü®60‚ü©]
#### Igor Aniskevich
Frontend Engineer, BelVG
![Quote‚ü®55‚ü©]
‚Äò‚ÄôIn the past, translating designs into code was always a boring and time-consuming process. But with CodeParrot, everything has changed! I simply uploaded my design, configured the desired code settings, and in a matter of seconds, I had ready-to-use code. Furthermore, CodeParrot can take reference from Figma, a design application, which makes the process even more convenient and faster. CodeParrot is a real must-have for any developer who wants to: Reduce UI development time, Improve code quality, Focus on more creative tasks‚Äô‚Äô

generated_description:
**CodeParrot AI: A Quick Overview**

Founded in 2022 and backed by Y Combinator‚Äôs Winter 2023 batch, CodeParrot AI is an innovative startup hailing from Bengaluru, India. The company‚Äôs mission is clear: to help developers build stunning user interfaces (UIs) at lightning speed. 

### What They Do

Originally launched as a developer-first design-to-code tool, CodeParrot AI leverages artificial intelligence to transform design components from Figma files or screenshots into production-ready code. The tool aims to streamline the frontend development process, allowing engineers to focus on more creative tasks instead of getting bogged down in the mundane aspects of coding.

### Key Features
- **Rapid UI Generation:** CodeParrot can produce frontend pages in minutes rather than days, vastly improving efficiency for teams.
- **Tech Stack Compatibility:** The platform works seamlessly with popular technologies like React, Flutter, Angular, and more.
- **Integration with Existing Code:** Developers can integrate themes, components, and libraries from their existing projects, while adhering to their coding standards.

### Customer Base

From startups to Fortune 500 companies, engineers at organizations like Mercedes-Benz, Accenture, and LinkedIn are leveraging CodeParrot to supercharge their UI development. 

### Team
With a nimble team of just two, CodeParrot AI is not only agile but also primed for rapid development and deployment of future enhancements. Brad Flora serves as the Group Partner, guiding the company‚Äôs strategic direction.

### Pricing Plans
CodeParrot AI offers flexible pricing, starting from $19 per seat per month for individuals and small teams, scaling up to enterprise solutions with custom themes and an emphasis on data security.

### User Feedback

Feedback from users is overwhelmingly positive. Many developers report a dramatic reduction in UI development time and have hailed the tool as a remarkable productivity booster. Testimonials highlight the efficiency with which CodeParrot converts designs into usable code, allowing teams to innovate rather than iterate.

### Conclusion

CodeParrot AI stands as a prime example of how AI can disrupt traditional workflows in software development. By merging the worlds of design and development, they‚Äôre creating powerful tools that cater to the modern developer‚Äôs needs. If you‚Äôre looking to streamline your UI development process, it‚Äôs definitely worth checking out their [website](https://codeparrot.ai/) and testing out their offerings.
